translation.welcomeDesc: To get started, create a new wallet or import an existing one.

onboarding.importDesc: Import an existing wallet with your seed phrase or private key

mnemonic.title: Recovery Phrase
mnemonic.subTitle: You can only recover your account by those phrases. Please sotre it somewhere safe.

biometrics.title: Secure Your Wallet
